channel.title: Posts on Daniel Severo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Daniel Severo

item.title: Handling Time-series in Pandas and Numpy.
item.description: Here we will show you how to properly use the Python Data Analysis Library (pandas) and numpy. The agenda is: How to load data from csv files The basic pandas objects: DataFrames and Series Handling Time-Series data Resampling (optional) From pandas to numpy Simple Linear Regression Consider leaving a Star if this helps you. The following ipython magic (this is literally the name) will enable plots made by matplotlib to be rendered inside this notebook.

item.title: Ad hoc Big Data Analysis with Dask
item.description: How can we keep the simplicity and power of pandas, while extending it to be out-of-core and parallel?
